name: A Void of Color
description:
The god Nemesis has passed judgement on your world and taken all color from it. Attempt dodge incoming spheres of color to reach the warp portal to the next level. If you are able to complete her ten levels, then you can save the world!!

-Features-   

-Completely-FREE  

 -Interactive story! 

 -Over ten difficult levels. 

 -Original soundtrack. 

 -Unique art!

*Best played on Mobile*
